Articles.Content:
Thank you Nittany Tiger and Artemisrain for your help on the colors. I have fixed all of mine and now everything is back to normal. I was able to find everything. I did almost miss a couple in the Misc folder. the SwitchPanelsShort at the bottom has a couple colors off to the far right and you have to scroll to find them. Also the parachute is in the Misc folder as well. In the SmallLabelPlate.

Thanks again guys for your help on this!

No problem.  I need to go ahead and fix the other colors on my save.  I think both of our methods plus Find and Replace will fix it, and in fact either us or the mod dev can just run that on their install files and call it a 1.2 patch.

Alright, [@artemisrain](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/141419-artemisrain/)'s syntax correction works and now I have all of my text correct.  My supposed regex for Find and Replace was bad, though.  The correct search regex is \[#<=(([0-9]:"[0-9a-fA-F]{8}";"[0-9a-fA-F]{8}";"[0-9a-fA-F]{8}")|([0-9]:[0-9a-fA-F]{6};[0-9a-fA-F]{6};[0-9a-fA-F]{6}))=>\] and the replace regex is <#<=\1=>>.  So in my instructions to use Find and Replace, after doing the find and replace for single-color codes, repeat those instructions using the new search regex and the new replace regex for the multicolored ones.  That should be all you need to do to make this mod work properly for 1.2.

Hi there.

Would you be so kind as to show me where I can get the .zip file for this mod ?

Thank you.

Here is my version with the fixed color syntax.  I haven't found much of any other issues with the mod, though sometimes autopilot settings reset or turn off when you have MechJeb activated and switch between IVA and regular view.  So far as I know my other mods don't interfere.  I am running 1.2.1 and am waiting for mods to update before moving to 1.2.2.  I hope I'm not breaking any rules with this post but I will take it down if so.  
  
[http://www.filedropper.com/rpmmk2replacement-artemisraintempfix](http://www.filedropper.com/rpmmk2replacement-artemisraintempfix)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-08T16:15:53Z" title="12/08/2016 04:15  PM" data-short="7 yr">December 8, 2016</time> by artemisrain**

**Update!**

### 
'MK1-2' IVA Replacement by ASET - v 0.2.0

- overlay mesh is added
- interior model is improved, some textures are added
- the new power supply panel
- solar panels and fuel cells control
- throttle-limit
- G-force monitor
- emergency radio beacon
- the new color theme is added for МК1-2 (different from ALCOR) with the new "COLOR\_OVERRIDE" feature

I just loaded the new version of this & tried it out. Looks great! However, I did run into an issue. I tried to recover the craft using the recovery radio in the IVA. The system threw all kinds of NREs and I could not enter any buildings. When I stopped & reloaded the game, the recovered craft was back on the launchpad.

The craft in question was just the Mk 1-2 Command Pod w/ 3 Kerbals, using this IVA.
OH YEAH BABY! I LOVE YOU [@alexustas](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/78632-alexustas/)

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/DD4UV44X2ys?start=8&feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>

A trip to a station on Mun, near the equatorial arch.   Uses the Mk 1-2 Command Pod as the CM and the ALCOR capsule as the LM.

The goal was to land within 500m of the station.

The guy working on RPM is [@MOARdV](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/60950-moardv/), and he's given up on adding features for now, working on his own bottom-up replacement. So if there is integration between cockpits and RemoteTech's flight computer, it will not be soon.

crash on linux detailed in [this](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/156922-help-somone-find-the-cause-of-this-crash/) post. final log uploaded with clean install, only ASSET mk1-2 replacement and dependencies. log and craft files in linked post.

> I'm wondering if anyone can help me, the MFD's are not crisp they have some artifacts on them, it appears low resolution yet when I see videos on it, comparatively its high resolution.

Spacecraft in the KSP are not so much detailed and complex in order for the players to have the opportunity and the need to manage the valves of the hydraulic engine system and other complex vessel systems
